title: How to Make Pi Day Pizza

steps.headline: Instead of shaping the dough to fit the pan, cut it into a Pi shape.
steps.description: Draw out a large Pi template on cardboard, cut out the pi shape and place this template over the rolled out dough. Cut the dough shape using a sharp knife.

steps.headline: Carefully transfer the pi shaped pizza dough onto the pizza tray.
Add your favorite topping, from vegan to meat extravaganza.
steps.description: See How to make pizza if you're not sure how to add topping.

steps.headline: Bake for 5 to 20 minutes, depending on topping and choice of oven.
Remove.
steps.description: Serve uncut on a round plate. Enjoy!

text: Make pizza dough.  Instead of shaping the dough to fit the pan, cut it into a Pi shape. Draw out a large Pi template on cardboard, cut out the pi shape and place this template over the rolled out dough. Cut the dough shape using a sharp knife. Carefully transfer the pi shaped pizza dough onto the pizza tray.  Add your favorite topping, from vegan to meat extravaganza. See How to make pizza if you're not sure how to add topping. Bake for 5 to 20 minutes, depending on topping and choice of oven.  Remove. Serve uncut on a round plate. Enjoy!
